short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make HW Tools better, and share your data with us.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You play Hero Wars on Facebook and want to get more out of the game? Then install HW Sniffer and send a copy of your game data to our server. Via our web interface or app you can then evaluate the data with our tools.
